citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30pm on
09-Dec-19.
The APHIS official arrived at the facility at approximately 3:30pm. An employee was present and contacted the
licensee but he would not return in time for an inspection to be conducted and the employee was unable to conduct
the inspection herself.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30pm on
09-Dec-19.
The APHIS official arrived at the facility at approximately 3:30pm.  An employee was present and contacted the
licensee but he would not return in time for an inspection to be conducted and the employee was unable to conduct
the inspection herself.
